original_title: Alles ist Architektur: Porträt Hans Hollein
overview: The Austrian architect Hans Hollein belongs to the world elite of architects since his candle shop Retti in Vienna (1965). His museum in Mönchengladbach (1982) revolutionized museum architecture in our century, and his Haas-Haus (1990) in Vienna became the most disputed post-war building in Vienna.
title: Alles ist Architektur: Porträt Hans Hollein
